title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Combine spaghetti, bacon, and egg mixture.
Serve with a sprinkle of black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Prepare a tomato-based gravy with cream and spices.
Add grilled chicken to the gravy.
Simmer and serve with rice or naan.
